We stayed in 3 places over our 5D4N trip in Da Nang/Hoi An, and Linh's place was by far the best. The room and linens were spotless, the bathroom was beautiful, fancy appliances (kettle, microwave, toaster all in a beautiful retro style). And most importantly, the bicycles were almost new! Compared to the bikes at our 2 other places, these were really good condition and made our adventuring around Da Nang so easy and convenient. There are a lot of good restaurants just up the street. Location is good for nearby places like Con Market, but you will probably need to Grab to the beach. Distance from Son Tra Night market was walkable - we crossed the Dragon Bridge and it was an easy walk back. 100% would recommend for this price.

Lihn's location was pretty central and easy to get to various locations around Da Nang. We only stayed a night, so the single room and bed was more than enough for our stay. Lihn was communicative and spoke to us days in advance of us arriving.

Linhâ€™s place was a great find for us! It was very close to restaurants, spas, and lots of other things to do. The place is easy to find, and the room is very comfortable. Linh was also very friendly and quick to respond to our requests. The only reason that I gave 4 stars was because the construction noise during our stay from 2-6pm that caused us to not be able to rest. Linh had construction at her place, and knowing our luck, her closeby neighbour also had construction. We would appreciate knowing this in advance whatsoever so we could be able to plan better.
The host being very nice and helpful! Everything was provided and especially washing for free x will definitely come back!!!
Great location for your stay in Da Nang. Everything is centrally located and you can just walk yourself to an amazing evening.

Linh's place is a gem! It is 5 minutes walk from the Dragon Bridge and the Cham Museum, with many cafes dotting the neighborhood, making it easy to grab a coffee at almost anytime of the day.
Finding it is easy. With clear step-by-step instructions, checking in is breezy. The place is clean I feel at home from the moment I stepped in. The room and bathroom are spotlessly clean with big bed and high quality mattress and pillows. As the place is not facing a main road, I had uninterrupted sleep throughout my stay.
Linh is very friendly and responsive. I will definitely choose to stay here again during my future visits to Da Nang.

I am so happy with my stay here. This space is so cozy, clean and comfy! I felt very at-home and safe here.
I really like Da Nang and I loved walking around the area. In fact, from this Airbnb, you could take a walk or run across the dragon bridge and around to the Cau Song Han bridge and back and it's about 5km total. Super nice!
So many lovely cafes and restaurants around. My favorite cafe for Vietnamese feeling was Tiá»‡m cÃ  phÃª Cáº­u Ãšt, right across the street. For working, I loved Ge or Wonderlust cafe.
To the beach is only about 10 mins away by Grab bike.
Linh was super responsive and helpful. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a cozy stay in Da Nang.

Heel moderen en mooi ingericht huis met alles erop en eraan. Host reageerde snel op alles en was enorm behulpzaam. Locatie was ook goed, verschillende zaken op wandelafstand. Beach moet je een scooter huren of grab gebruiken. Ik raad men verblijf hier zeker aan! :) top

Linhâ€™s place is a great find! We stayed for a few nights and found the location to be a perfect spot in town for us! Very close to the dragon bridge, and tons of storefronts and cafes! We are on a long trip around Southeast Asia, so finding a place with a large kitchen and washer/dryer combo was the highlight for us, definitely made us feel at home with all of those conveniences! The rooms are a decent size, with a private bathroom, desk, mini fridge big bed and wardrobe closet in them (and the air con works very well too!). We thought that the rooms were also pretty well spread out too, as we hardly ever heard the other guests when in them. The common space that you share with the other guests is VERY well maintained and has a homey feel to it, there is an outdoor patio on the ground floor along with a rooftop one! The instructions to get into the house are very clear, which was nice since we arrived quite late into the night. Would ABSOLUTELY recommend this spot and plan to return!

Our stay at this Airbnb was absolutely perfect and truly deserves a 5-star rating!
From the moment we arrived, the service was exceptional, the host was very responsive and went above and beyond to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience.
The apartment itself was immaculately clean, sparkling from top to bottom, making us feel instantly comfortable and at ease. We especially loved the aesthetic minimalist decor, which created such a serene and stylish atmosphere. Every detail was thoughtfully considered, contributing to a truly relaxing and delightful stay.
We can't recommend this place enough!"

This is the nicest apartment I've stayed at in Da Nang. It's basically brand new and is a loft style layout with floor to ceiling windows offering an excellent view of the airport, allowing you to watch the planes take off. The sound insulation is good and unlike many of the buildings closer to the beach, there are no issues with humidity/dampness.
The apartment is on the top floor of a mixed-use building on a main street that makes it easy to go all the restaurants and cafes in Hai Chau. It's also really not that far from the beach side of the river either. If you want to enjoy Da Nang but not have to deal with the craziness and traffic of My An in the high season, this is a really good spot.
The hosts are friendly and very responsive.

I loved my stay here. So much so that when I return to Da Nang in November, I'll be booking more than 2 nights accommodation. Yes, there is construction work next door but this is Vietnam so something to be expected :) I found the construction work noise did not interfere with my stay here.
Loved the room. Although not quite as sparkly as the photos, still attractive. Lots of cupboards, nice kitchenette, fabulous (marble?) floor tiles and a window to open a bit for fresh air whilst sleeping at night.
Even able to get YouTube and Netflix on the TV.
Already looking forward to my next stay here.

Nous n'avons pas eu d'eau chaude pour la fin de douche de la deuxiÃ¨me personne cela est trÃ¨s dommage !

For the cost you wonâ€™t find a better place. Close to beach and several restaurants! Young Chan was always responsive and clear. I stayed for a month but if I return I will stay longer. The only thing I wish could be addressed in the building were noisy neighbors in the building that were circulating through at all hours of the night. Other that nothing major to report.
Great host and extremely fast at his replies. We had a very late check-in due to a flight delay and he was still waiting for us late at night!
The room is so so, I only enjoy it a half of day due to my early flight, but I think it deserves its price
Great place to stay - really clean and a fantastic location! The staff were so helpful, would definitely recommend!!

Great stay, very nice place, great service and cleaning offered by the host. Nice and comfortable and a 1 minute drive to the beach.
Right off a main road with dozens of upscale bars and restaurants. The mattress was very firm for my liking but I hear thatâ€™s popular in Vietnam. Excellent value for price.
The TV has Netflix , YouTube and all the apps I use to watch TV. Highly recommended place!

It was fine for me :)
except for the noises and no scissors, i also had to fix some light sensors everything else okays.
Staff was very helpful and responsive! Area was very safe! If you are looking for an inexpensive place to stay then, this is a great spot!

Young was always very fast at responding which I appreciated whenever I had questions. He offered daily room cleaning and the staff working in the building were all very nice. The room itself was beautiful and looked just like the pictures. Overall, an amazing stay!

Everything went good! Young Chan replies fast and the rooms were really clean and very big. Washing is free (you also have two machines) and renting scooter went also really well. Only thing we didnâ€™t like was that we didnâ€™t feel welcomed by the staff working there. No smiles, no welcoming words, somehow bad mood .. and we also had the feeling they were talking about us (of course we donâ€™t know if they talked good or bad about us, as we donâ€™t know the language, but they were looking us up and down and chatting about us). So we didnâ€™t feel very comfortable with them. But other than that the experience was good and itâ€™s a really nice room!

We stayed at this charming bungalow and had a mixed experience. The host was very responsive and helpful, which truly stood out.
However, several issues affected our comfort.
1. The ground floor toilet's flush tank didnâ€™t work.
2. We were greeted by black ants on arrival. A dead cockroach was found in the bedroom, pointing to the need for pest controlâ€”tropical climate shouldn't be the only excuse.
3. Bedroom AC units cooled slowly, and without a centralized system, the living room became too hot to enjoy.
4. A dressing mirror is missing in the upper bedroom; the small one in the bathroom isn't adequate.
5. Musical instruments add a lovely vibe, but the heat makes it hard to enjoy them for long.
The property has great potential with its spacious layout and creative touches. With better attention to maintenance and cooling, it could easily become one of the more comfortable and enjoyable stays nearest to Airport area. Close proximity to Airport is a big plus. Thankyou ğŸ˜Š

Amazing place. Felt like home.

â€œExceptional Stay at Da Nang Camellia Home!â€
We had a truly wonderful experience staying at Da Nang Camellia Home! The property is beautifully furnished with three spacious bedrooms, each with its own attached washroom, ensuring plenty of privacy and convenience for our big family. The home was equipped with everything we needed, and the internet connectivity was excellent throughout, which was a big plus for everyone.
What made this stay extra special was the incredible hospitality of the host. They went above and beyond to make us feel welcome, even arranging to pick up our large family upon arrival, which was such a thoughtful gesture. Their care and attention to detail made us feel right at home, and they were always available to assist with any questions or requests.
The location was also ideal â€” peaceful yet close to all the key attractions in Da Nang. We couldnâ€™t have asked for a better experience. 5â­ï¸

We stayed at this 4-story house for nearly a week, and everything exceeded our expectations. The house features 3 bedrooms, 5 beds, 3 bathrooms, 1 restroom, and a beautiful kitchen and dining area that looks even better than the pictures.
The house is cozy and thoughtfully designed in a modern Euro-American style, offering all the necessary amenities you could think of. The attic room, designed for children, has bunk beds and a bit of noise from the water pump, but all the other conveniences made our stay so comfortable that any minor inconvenience was quickly forgotten.
The location is central, making it easy to get around, and itâ€™s near the airport without any noise disturbance from airplanes. Every detail of the house is meticulously decorated, from the dishes and glasses to the flower vasesâ€”itâ€™s as beautiful as a painting.
The host was incredibly supportive and attentive throughout our stay. If I could, I would give her 10 stars! Highly recommended for the family or group.

This cozy place provides a comfortable stay for a while. Itâ€™s conveniently located near cafes and local food spots, making it easily accessible to the beach. I had a great nightâ€™s sleep thanks to the great air conditioner. Thankfully , thereâ€™s no karaoke or bike vendors around. The owners are super friendly.

One of the best Airbnbs Iâ€™ve ever stayed in â€“ it truly felt like home! The place was spotless, just a short walk to the beach, and surrounded by great restaurants, coffee shops, a pharmacy, and a grocery store. No issues at all finding the location on Grab. Would definitely love to come back. Thanks so much!

One of my favorite stays. The room is soooo spacious and clean. The area is nice and the parking out front for the motorbike was very convenient. Will definitely book again if I'm in the area. Also allowed me to check in earlier which was so kind of them.

Cannot recommend this place enough! Super friendly family running it, they are responsive and helpful. Under 10 min walk to the beach, tons of restaurants and cafes nearby, and several convenience stores and a grocery store within a stone's throw. Lots of other tourists in the area, but a very laidback vibe in the neighborhood. The room is big, the bed is big and super comfy, free Netflix on TV, cold AC, a standing fan, hot water, and a full kitchen downstairs (even has a proper oven, I made pizza!) Always super easy to get a Grab bike. It's a quiet house with a free laundry machine on the roof (air dry) and weekly cleaning. I would absolutely stay here again next time I'm in Danang! Xin cam on!

It's a great stay for a while or  for a long time. The kitchen is big, also as the room. Inside you'll find everything you need. The place is calm and peaceful. If you'll have a bike, it's easy to get any other districts in 5-10 minutes

Wow, what a lovely place to stay and an amazing host. So helpful and genuinely warm family. It is a perfect location, a little away from the busy areas but a nice walk along the beach if you want to be closer to the action. Host family take so much pride in their home and their hospitality was lovely.

Our favorite AirBnb in 3 years of travelling.
Host 10/10
Bed 10/10
Wifi 10/10
Kitchen 10/10
Location 10/10
Checkin & out 10/10
We will be so happy to return.
Thanks for hosting us. ğŸ«¶

An excellent stay with everything that you would want. The host is super helpful and ensures that the guest faces literally zero problems while checking-in, staying and checking-out. I highly recommend this Homestay, it is near to the beach and right at the heart of the city. Peaceful surroundings (if you like to sleep peacefully), very close to almost all the attractions. The room was super clean and had all the mentioned amenities.

The team were very friendly and proactive with messaging. We were allowed to leave our luggage and use the toilet even after checkout. The room was perfectly clean and both the room and bathroom were very spacious. The shower water pressure was fantastic as well. Particularly enjoyed the electrical fly swat to catch some pesky mosquitoes that had made it past the mosquito nets. Overall I would recommend this place and we were sad to leave.
Lovely hosts who are welcoming and always around to help. The area is quiet compared to the city area but is close enough to get to places. Will come back if I visit Danang!

great place to stay. Nguyen is a great host and will help you with everything. he helped us renting a scooter and even gave advise on the places to visit. the room is very big with a nice bathroom. wifi was very good as well.

Great place! Clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was very attentive and responded quickly to all questions. The location is convenient. Lots of cafes and shops nearby. Iâ€™ll definitely return if Iâ€™m in the city again. Highly recommend!

We enjoyed our stay here. The host was really helpful throughout the stay, from helping us with any issues and also giving us local recommendationsâ˜ºï¸ The area is quiet and u can find some food nearby but we mostly went further from this area. Overall would recommend staying here as all amenities are provided and host is friendly.

Meine Mutter und ich haben uns wohl gefÃ¼hlt. Die Gastgeber waren sehr hilfsbereit und es fanden nette Unterhaltungen statt. Danke fÃ¼r die Restaurant- und CafÃ©-Empfehlungen!

I had an excellent stay at Ciao Homestay in Danang! The family hosting this homestay is incredibly welcoming and goes above and beyond to make your visit unforgettable. The room was spacious, and the kitchen was well-equipped with utensils and a fridge, which was very convenient. The location is perfectâ€”close to shops and just a short walk to the beach.
The biggest highlight, however, was the communication and genuine kindness of the owners. They truly made me feel at home and ensured that everything I needed was taken care of. I would highly recommend Ciao Homestay to anyone visiting Danang!
Everything was great, the location is very near to the beach, good environment, I recommend it 100%
Ciao homestay is located in a very peaceful street with almost everything available nearby. The host was very responsive and helpful.
Alt var super godt, og vÃ¦rten var virkelig sÃ¸d!

Host is friendly and speaks English. Wifi worked ok.  Bed was firm but comfortable.  The doors could be a little tricky but the host said she would improve that.  That was the only negative we could find overall itâ€™s a great 5 star condo.  Walkable to beach and 2 different very nice coffee shops.

My stay here was absolutely fantastic! The space was spotless, cozy, and had everything I needed. What really made the difference was the host â€” super kind, quick to respond, and went out of their way to help whenever I had a question. It made the whole trip feel easy and stress-free. Would definitely stay again!
I loved the apartment, very cozy and wide, and the neighborhood is really calm. There is even a washing machine. I wished I could stay more, I would definitely come back there :))

It was such a great experience renting this apartment from Linh and her brother Van! We were personally met at arrival and he showed us the apartment and explained everything! There is everything you need in the apartment!
They gave us amazing recommendations about sightseeings, restaurants and bike rental! They were very helpful and kind!
Thank you so much, we are definitely coming back someday!

The apartment is spacious for a one bedroom. The mattress is firm if thatâ€™s what you prefer. Location is just a few streets over from the beach. About 20-25 minute walk to the main DaNang beach. Plenty of local places to eat on the main road. Not quiet, there is a boxing studio downstairs, but it is one of the most quiet places weâ€™ve had in Vietnam. The host communicates very well, even brought me a dessert for international womenâ€™s day.
Very neat and hygienic room. All amenities were provided. Very helpful host. Overall a very good experience
Linh war ein super host. Wir haben es dort geliebt. Er war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. die Unterkunft ist sauber und bietet viel Platz. wir empfehlen diese Unterkunft.

Very nice apartment for the money spent. Excellent air conditioning.
Location ok.
We are happy for having chosen this apartment.

Great place to stay, has everything you need for a stay.
Host was great, always responsive and very helpful.
Enjoyed my stay at this place and can only recommend it!!!
Great place in Danang, simple but with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. Helpful, friendly and responsive host.
Clean and cozy room away from the busy and noisy Danang. The room is quiet despite local renovations. Lihn is very responsive and proactive. A good value stay overall

A very nice and peaceful spot. As well as spacious.
I had a great two weeks here and slept very well.
Would stay again! :)

We really enjoyed our time in Da Nang at Linh's. The apartment is as described and matches the pictures.  We appreciated having a kitchen with clean dishes and nice appliances like a rice cooker, electric stove and large fridge with a freezer. Also there's a clothes washing machine in the bathroom. Linh was very accommodating, arranged furniture in the apartment before our arrival and helped us rent a motorbike. Location is on the southern end of the city not far either the riverfront or beach. It is a quieter part of town, but there are still plenty of restaurants within walking distance and a 24hr convenience store on the same block. You will be in good hands if you stay here the hosts are incredibly responsive and friendly. Glad we got to stay somewhere so nice for a month!

It was the third apartment we have tried in Baliza Home!
Great apartment! It has everything you need. I liked the kitchen and amenities â€“ even a microwave oven â€“ which is a great plus!
I also liked that the bathroom had a separate place for the shower â€“ so you don't take a shower near the toilet and have water everywhere in the floor.
The bed was huge!
The window doesn't look at the wall.
So, I definitely recommend it!

Linh and Binh were amazing hosts. The house is new and gives off a luxurious feeling. The high ceilings and the wooden floors and ceiling add a very warm and stylish touch. There's also a small but lovely balcony, perfect for enjoying a morning coffee.
Linh and Binh are very attentive and professional. They helped me rent a motorbike and even shared super useful lists of places to visit via WP. I can also say they are kind and respectful people.
The house is located in a developing, quiet, and safe neighborhood. As far as I know, many digital nomads and tourists stay around here. It's not super close to the beach, but I walked there a few times with no problem. Grab rides are quick and convenient anyway. Plus, being in the center of the island means you're equally close to many different spots.
I was really happy with both the place and the hosts. Highly recommended!
Lovely welcome, and they did everything to make sure my stay went smoothly. Area is quiet and I would definitely come back here if I was in Da Nang again

Absolutely loved the place! the host and the co-host made my stay very special, they were super friendly and helpful. the apartment is definitely worth the price. Felt at home right away.  would love to come back. thank you!

Die Kommunikation zwischeneinander war sehr gut und auch gastfreundlich, die Unterkunft ist such wie beschrieben und alles ist schÃ¶n sauber. Wir mussten unsere Koffer wiegen und hab die Gastgeber nach einer Wage gefragt und diese waren sehr freundlich uns eine zu besorgen. Ich empfehle ihnen den Aufenthalt hier.

I have stayed in this host's house many times, the host is always very hospitable, quick to respond, and enthusiastic support. In addition, these houses are always neat and clean. One of the most enthusiastic hosts in Da Nang ğŸ˜Š

Absolutely fantastic stay. All of the hosts are very friendly and welcoming. The apartment was exactly as shown on the photos. They went out of their way to make sure we had a comfortable stay and we loved it very much. 10/10 we will be back to stay again ğŸ™â¤ï¸

Had a great stay! Definitely will come and book with you again. Thank you for the great hospitality! The room was super cozy and comfortable especially after a long day strolling around Da Nang.

Apartment was opposite the beach, but basically nothing else around. Quite far out of the main area.
No sun lounges on this end of the beach.
On either side of the apartment are vacant blocks filled with trash.
The host was great at responding to messages.

Had an amazing stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and well-located. It truly felt like homeâ€”loved every bit of it! The lady at the reception (Maria) was kind and hospitable, making the experience even better. Highly recommend!

We had a truly wonderful stay at Mercury House in Da Nang from 8th to 11th June. Located right opposite the beautiful My Khe Beach, the property is a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and warm hospitality.
The rooms were clean. Waking up and stepping out to the beach just across the road was an absolute delight. The location is idealâ€”not just for beach lovers, but also for those wanting easy access to restaurants, cafes, and local attractions.
A special shoutout to Julie, our host, who made our stay even more memorable. Her attention to detail, friendly nature, and prompt assistance truly set Mercury House apart.
She went above and beyond to ensure we felt at home and had everything we needed.
Our stay at Mercury beach house was great! very close to the beach and the hostâ€™s recommendations including chickpea eatery was great :) Would recommend for a short stay in Da Nang
Everything was fine, unfortunately there was a very strong wind in the night I stayed at the apartment, so we were literally could not sleep at all because of the noise from creaking windows.
Everything was Perfect. The one Double  bedroom have a nice view. very clean and nice only one thing the power from the shower is very low but all the Rest was Perfect thank you
It was great staying at the place. The place had sea view which was really beautiful. We could reach to many places too.
Thanks for having us at your place. Appreciate how responsiveness the host was. I felt taken care of.
Great service, super clean! I was impressed at how clean everything was:, which is the most important thing to me. The staff was very responsive and always offered help when needed. Highly recommend!

Host was able to provide early check in which we were highly grateful for. The room was spacious, comfortable bed with soft bed linen, apartment was very clean. Host provides washing service too. Friendly staff who provided local recommendations. A few steps away from the beach and driving distance to local restaurants/shops etc!
Had a lovely stay. Room was clean. The receptionist were nice too. 100% worth the price
Good looking airbnb and Walking distance to the beach , 10/10 recommend
Great place to stay, the hosts were helpful, even helping us in our trip by booking tickets and cabs!
Perfect location for perfect price. Right next to the beach and facing the Son Tra mountains!

I'm torn with this response. This was a decent place - staff, location, area...We were far from the main strip where all the tourists were which is great if you want decent prices. However, sometimes you just miss the action. The scene was great, as far as the hotel itself, everything was much smaller than expected. There was a scent of mildew that came from the bathroom but if you left all the windows open throughout the day, you wouldn't have to worry about it. The beds were comfortable but took up most the space in the rooms so there was little to no room to walk around without having to jump over a bed. Walls are paper thin. The dogs outside were barking all throughout the night. The hotel barely cancels any noise but that being said, I got sound sleep. Some way, somehow.
Would I stay here again?? I don't know, maybe another room? I'm not against it because I could laugh and joke about it. The locals were cool...but I'm not jumping up to volunteer to stay here again.

It was the perfect stay. The place was very nice. The staff was so helpful and friendly. They had scooters for us to rent, they let us check out a little late and were so accommodating. Highly recommend

EVERYONE @MercuryBeach was amazing!! They offered us car service from the airport which was very affordable.

The hotel is off the beaten path were most of the tourists are , which was very nice . We will definitely be coming back here every time we visit Da Nang!!

Good location, within walking distance of many good eateries and things to do. Only down side is the building work happening next door & karaoke (but this is not the fault of the owner). Also, traffic noise is very loud, for those who sleep lightly, this may not be the best choice.
The property is at a beautiful location and is furnished tastefully. The host was responsive and very helpful. The jacuzzi overlooking the river front was a fantastic feature!
The place was at good location. Nearby to everything. It was gorgeous and comfortable to live in. The host was very responsive and helped with everything I needed. Recommend !!!

Check-in was smooth, but serious issues followed. The bathroom flooded constantly, then all water stopped. When it returned, it was gray and dirty. I contacted the host, who admitted water issues had happened before â€” yet still listed the unit. I requested a refund or early checkout; he refused both, then offered an â€œupgradeâ€ only after I made other plans. He then came to my door unannounced and persistently knocked despite me clearly saying I was unavailable â€” a major privacy violation.
I contacted Airbnb, and they agreed the situation was unacceptable, granting me early checkout and a 30% refund. Even then, the host sent messages and a cleaner before I had fully checked out. While the unit has potential, the handling of this situation was deeply unprofessional.
I strongly advise avoiding this unit â€” and any others run by this host.

good place near beach, room and place was nice. not as clean as expected but still good. the power outlets wouldn't let you plug things in, but i found an outlet behind the mini fridge that worked, so that was a bit of a pain.

Junos place is cozy and in a good location with lots of Vietnamese and Korean food around. It is around 20 minutes walk to the beach and five minutes walk to the big mall.
The room has a good size and two big beds. There is a fridge and a kettle and a little desk. The room is quite bright and has a lot of windows, but the curtains are also good to block the light at night.
General issue in Da Nang seems to be the moist in the rooms, so this is not a special thing in this room, but you want to open the windows as much as you can. By doing this airflow in this room is easy, as it has windows on two sides.
I recommend this apartment for your stay.

Me and my gf had a wonderful time at Junoâ€™s place. The building itself has beautiful architecture, a nice rooftop to relax on, nice walkable neighborhood and a cute cafe across the street. We stayed for an entire month and it felt just like home the entire time. Bum Junos talk was so sweet and greeted us each day when we arrived home. Everything was clean and looked just like the photos, we had lots of space and room for all our things. A big desk for me to work on my laptop as well.
In Vietnam people often like to honk at night crossing even small street instersections so sometimes this would wake you if you are a light sleeper. Other than that this is a very quiet and friendly and super safe neighborhood. This is away from the Main big Street on a side street so thatâ€™s good. Iâ€™d definitely recommend staying. Itâ€™s a beautiful place, feels very secure. Had a place to park our scooter out front as well.

My 3-night stay with Juno was an enjoyable one, merely because it showed me an interesting side of Danang I have never seen before. That particular room ambience felt very bright and positive despite the buzzing of motor scooters is very present. The bathroom shower situation in this room is a bit tricky. You would have to use his shower slippers provided to shower first, then ideally open the windows to let the floor get dry first (90 min) if you prefer to reenter the bathroom in a dry state. If youâ€™re showering first, and need to go in again immediately after (like me), itâ€™s a good idea to keep the shower slippers adjacent to the bathroom door. The pool is sadly neglected (not clean for proper use), which didnâ€™t stop me from enjoying the view and ambiance from his cute rooftop. Many reviews only mentioned Juno and Bom, but there are more interesting family members to encounter, in fact, there is one that looks almost identical as Juno :-)

Our late night flight arrived at Danang at around 1 AM. Juno had sent some very useful instructions which helped us find the place easily.
The room was good - clean & with all necessary amenities. Since I stayed for only 1 night, didnâ€™t get a chance to explore the neighbourhood.
Special shoutout to Juno for being the best AirBNB host Iâ€™ve come across :)
Although we reached so late in the night, he stayed awake and received us in person.
I was travelling with my grandmom - Juno very considerately reallocated our room from the 3rd to the 1st floor so she didnâ€™t have to climb a lot of stairs ( and I didnâ€™t even request him to do this! )
We had quite some luggage - he helped us in moving it to the 1st floor.
Although my visit was short, I can totally vouch for Juno - an incredibly kind and warm host â™¥ï¸

The location is perfect although you have to walk into an alleyway. Most markets are accessible from the location and it is surrounded by nice spas which is a plus point!

Quyen was an amazing host. Everything was most than exceptional. As for the stay everything was as described and location is optimal for anyone that wants to be close to the beach or just to casually walk around and venture the city

Our stay at this homestay was great. It's located on a calm street, yet itâ€™s still just a short walk or quick Grab ride to the beach. The bed was very comfortable, which was a rare find during our trip. It truly felt like home â€“ clean, cozy, and with a lovely room setting that made us feel relaxed from the moment we arrived. Hot water was available to shower.
The host was very responsive. For the price, this homestay offered amazing value. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable, homey, and convenient place to stay.

I was back before leaving in this trip to Da Nang and I will probably be back in the following ones. Thereâ€™s not many places that clean and neat around. Also the kitchen has loads of equipment so you can cook a nice meal! Thanks again, see you soon!
Quyenâ€™s place was excellent for the short term stay and behind reasonable for the price. The room was exactly as pictured, the AC and washer worked well, and communication was smooth. Recommended.

Sehr freundliche Gastgeberin, gutes Preis-LeistungsverhÃ¤ltnis und ruhige Lage.  Leider hat es aber geschimmelt und dementsprechend gerochen. Sobald das behoben ist, wÃ¼rden wir die Unterkunft aber weiterempfehlen :)

The host was very pleasant and the room was clean. It is a good deal for the money paid. It is at the end of a rather long, narrow alley and there is no way to be dropped off at the door with luggage. I suggested having two positions to hang the bathroom mirror as it is far too low for an adult male North American. Working around the door in the bathroom is a bit of a nuisance, but considering how little I paid, I just accepted it.

We really enjoyed our stay at Hanaâ€™s place. The location was just a few minute walk from the beach and lots of food choices! Bed was very comfortable and we had everything we needed to enjoy our week long stay! Hosts were very responsive to our needs! Canâ€™t go wrong book this place!!

Great location close to the beach and easy to reach from the airport. CafÃ©s, restaurants, and supermarkets within comfortable walking distance.
They had our room ready in no time because we arrived earlier.
Functional amenities, shower with rain, handheld, and faucet function (for sandy feet) ... albeit at times only luke warm.
Nice and quiet at night, slept well here and would come back.

This is a nice little hotel in a great location. The three people who work here are very friendly and helpful. I stayed in a room at the back of the building, which didnâ€™t have a view and was darker than I expected. Next time, I would book a front-facing room on a higher floor, which would make it a perfect place to stay.

Great location close to the beach and other facilities like shops, cafes, restaurants, massages are within a walking distance. The host is always responsive and friendly. The room was spacious and comfortable with a good cleaning service. In a word,  it is a very good choice. Thank you host and staff.

This apartment is very nice, but unfortunately, it's located in the middle of a construction site. Other Airbnb hosts have told me this before, and that's Berry fair. But not in this apartment. So, you're constantly bothered by noise.

Had a comfortable stay at Hanas place. Relatively quieter street but close to the beach. Everything was in order, clean with all the amenities. WiFi was decent if you need to catch up on work. Jenny at the front desk was friendly, polite and available for any queries. Would recommend!

I had a nice stay at The Navis. Hanna was a good host and always very responsive. Location is perfect with many restaurants and convenience stores around plus youâ€™re just a 5min walk from the beach. I would definitely stay here again

Hana's apartment is absolutely amazing! Comfy bed, hot shower all the amenities you need! I'd highly recommend staying here! She helped me out with some bus issues and went above and beyond what a host would do. She deserves more than 5*!

We had a wonderful stay in Da Nang! The location was perfect close to local marts, Indian restaurants walkable distance , and massage parlours, making it easy to enjoy the city.
Beach was literally a 5min walkğŸ«¶ğŸ»
The host was responsive and thoughtful, arranging a scooter for us in advance so our itinerary went smoothly from the moment we arrived.
She also went above and beyond by organizing our airport pickup and drop-off, which made our trip hassle-free.
The apartment was well-equipped, with a kitchen stocked with all the essentials for guests.
The laundry setup was convenient and included a compact drying area that worked perfectly.
Overall, a fantastic stay with a host who truly cares about her guests.
Highly recommended!

I would happily stay here again and again. Great location, very close to the beach, lot's of local places to eat and get coffee. Extremely helpful host.

Stayed here for a few nights and the experience is great! Lots of restaurants and cafÃ©s around. Since it's near the school you might hear kids playing around and school bells but it's not really an issue.
The room got cleaned and towels were changed to fresh ones after a couple of days which was awesome. It was also great that there's a washing machine available and there's a clothes line where you can dry your washed clothes! Did I mention that it's a few minutes away from the beach? Overall great choice for a place to stay.

This hotel allowed both early check in and to store our bags which was really helpful. It had everything we needed inside and staff were welcoming. It was also close to local amenities and the beach. Would recommend

A great location with so many cafes and restaurants around! The check-in was managed by Jenny and she is a wonderful and helpful person throughout the stay! the apartment has a private laundry machine in the unit!

I stayed at Hanaâ€™s place for 5 days.  The apartment was as advertised except the refrigerator was smaller than the pictures but it was fine for the amount of food I had.  The staff and housekeeper were very friendly and the room was cleaned in the middle of my stay which was appreciated.  The only issue was the last couple of days someone checked into the unit above and they were very noisy constantly dragging chairs across the floor and loud stomping which made it difficult to concentrate on work or get sleep at night.

I had a wonderful stay. The host and staff were exceptionally kind and welcoming. The property was clean, well-maintained, and conveniently located within walking distance to many attractions, especially the beach. I would gladly return in the future. Thank you for the great experience!
Had a wonderful stay! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was friendly, responsive, and made the check-in process super easy. Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Amazing apartment in a beautiful location. Nearby lots of coffee shops, restaurants and the beach. Quiet neighbourhood and very kind and helpful staff. I definitely recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Danang, very beautiful place. Thank you Hana and staff ğŸ™ğŸ˜Š

great place to stay in da nang. very clean, comfortable bed, spacious, good location and quiet. everything worked as it should. will stay longer next time. thank you Hana and Jenny!

Great location, close to the beach, plenty of cafes, its clean inside, Jenny at the reception was super friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend this place to my friends and will come back soon!

Good place, easy to find and walkable to the beach. Has a washing machine. Only thing is that the shower was a bit sketchy with an open tile on the roof and there were some moth flies flying from the drainage.

The views were spectacular! both from balcony in the room and on the 29th floor at the pool.
Sang, thank you for everything

The place is clean with a great view and the host is very responsive and accommodating. Thank you.

Great place to stay! Had a great time here, cozy bed, super clean bathroom, nice view from balcony. The suite is located at the Golden Bay hotel, it has a couple places within the hotel where you can get coffee and it has a small convenient store.
The hist met us at the lobby and helped us with our luggage, showed us the room and was friendly.
The unit offered a small fridge, plates, glasses and a kettle. Bottled water was also provided. The pool located on the 29th floor has an incredible view of Da Nang. Over all we had a fantastic time and would recommend this Airbnb. Location was good for us as we did not want to be right downtown, city is easy to navigate and very accessible.

Sang's place is studio apartment  located at Whydam Golden Bay Danang.  It is 5 star rated hotel.  There ate hotel side and apartment side.  However you can use infinity pool on 29th floor and Korean Sauna on 2nd floor.   It was spacious and clean.  I recommend this place and we would stay here again if we return to the area.
Amazing place, especially the jaw dropping view and the pool !
value for money, perfect for a tranquil escape, scenic sunset view, cool pool

Amazing place. Host was above nd be young. Not only u got a 5 star hotel. You have a very functional kitchen on balcony. A nice balcony to sit on and watch the sunsets. Unit comes with 2!!! Refrigerators. So u r build for a long term stay and a convenient one. The area felt quite but safe. From here we ventured to our daily tours.
A real luxurious stay for a minimal cost. Rooftop is romantic to stay on. Have a drink and view the world from the 29th floor. We stayed there a couple of time. Not to mention the Infiniti pool. One of a kind hotel. The unit is new. Bath tub is large new and. Lea and so is everything else. Sheets were white clean and nice. Bed was excellent. I can not say even one unflattering word. You must try this place.
And the host was friendly, helpful, available and there when you needed here. Even at our 5:30 am departure.
Thank you.
One of a kind.
100% Worth the stay also one of the best Host Team I ever had. I only can Recommend that Airbnb for your stay in Da Nang

I had a fantastic stay in here, and it's definitely worth raving about. The apartment was exactly as depicted in the photosâ€”neat and comfortable. What made the stay memorable, moreover, was interacting with Thuong at the front desk. She was incredibly friendly and helpful, enhancing my stay with her local tips and suggestions.
I did use the corrections that other guests made in their reviews for the GRAB address, which was helpful!
The room itself was immaculately clean and well-equipped, making for a homely experience. The only minor hiccup was a slight odor in the washing machine. I'd suggest a cleaning to ensure a perfect experience for future guests.
Overall, this was a delightful stay. A big thanks to Thuong and the apartment for adding such a wonderful chapter to my journey in Vietnam !
Great place and easy to find. Hosts were friendly and efficient with giving information. Special thanks to the hosts for giving me and my partner a great hospitality

The couch is very old and isn't very comfortable and the bed is very uncomfortable.

The place is really clean and welcoming. Host stayed up to welcome us inside and show us everything we needed to know like AC, Lights, Shower etc. Also helped with bag storage while we spent a day away in another place.

We enjoyed our stay but be aware of construction happening in the neighbouring buildings at 6am every morning. The bathroom is very awkward with no counter space and the shower head is nearly directly on top of the sink. The amenities listed were correct, as the wifi worked well and the tv had Netflix on it.
Alright for the price. Room appears dirty bc floor is stained. Bathroom was illogical and frustrating to use. A few mosquitoes each day. But good service and comfortable overall.

The location was closer to the airport and is like a km away from the beach, very quiet and quintessential neighbourhood a bit away from the touristy cafe towns but closer to the markets and mid town, the check in and check out was really smooth, and easy, the host was very responsive and helpful and provided us good recommendations on things, overall worth what we paid for.

Thank you Young, very friendly host. And I walked to the city from the house for 20 minutes got to all the places. Beautiful building, room all white inside (no view though and all day long construction - the only thing, but if you come to walk around and not stay at home then itâ€™s totally fine)

Nous avons passÃ© un trÃ¨s bon sÃ©jour dans ce logement. Cependant le lit est un petit peu ferme,  mais pour une ou deux nuits c'est amplement suffisant. Le prix est trÃ¨s correct, je vous le recommande si vous cherchez un logement Ã  Da Nang

All good! The room looked like on the pictures, a tiny bit worn by now, as expected from a place with a lot of guests. I'd say it's more like a hotel room with a private bathroom than an apartment. When we stayed the construction next door wasn't noisy at all. Equipment as described - a kettle, a minifridge, a TV with Netflix and a shared free washing machine on the top floor. Hot water and shower pressure are great, wi-fi good too. There's always someone helpful at the reception during the day and communication via messages is fast and proactive. When we arrived, the floor wasn't very clean but when they did housekeeping the next time, it was spotless, so hopefully just a one-off. Easy to find and we were able to do an easy self check-in after a night bus. Good location - a short walk to the beach, shops, restaurants and a longer but nice walk along the river to the Dragon bridge. A good deal for Da Nang, would stay again.

He regularly asked me if I need anything throughout my stay. Put me in contact with his staff when he wasnâ€™t available to make sure someone was accessible at all times. Great communication usually responding within 30 minutes

I really love this unit, The surrounding is quiet, nice restaurants and Cafe shop and the internet is great for working remote. I recommend this however the construction next to it is loud during the day. but it's not his fault.  this is an excellent place overall
Sadly construction workers woke me up more than 3 days but that's the fault of the owner, other than that everything was great
Place is very basic.. not a lot of sunlight like the picture.. no desk for working.. very basic toiletries

I don't know where to start .. I was supposed to stay only 4 days here but I extended my stay! Sang and his entire family are super friendly, kind and highly responsive. This has got to be the best hosting experience I have ever had .. much love! They also gave me the best local recommendations for everything.

We stayed at Da Nang and even though our trip started off stressful due to a delayed flight, Sang made everything so much easier for us. We were originally supposed to arrive on the 26th, but ended up arriving late on the 27th. It was a tough travel day, and we were really exhausted and stressed.
The host was incredibly kind and flexible. Even though our stay was shorter and we would be checking out early, he still offered us a discount. That thoughtful gesture really meant a lot to us and showed how much he cares about his guests.hospitality and understanding made a big difference during our trip. We truly appreciate everything and would absolutely recommend staying here to anyone visiting Da Nang. Looking forward to coming back under better circumstances for a longer stay

A Heartfelt Gem in the Middle of Da Nang â€“ Phuâ€™s Airbnb is Home Away From Home
If I could give more than five stars, I would. Phuâ€™s Airbnb in Da Nang isnâ€™t just a place to stayâ€”itâ€™s a full experience, and one that left me feeling both grateful and a little sad to leave behind. Whether youâ€™re a solo traveler, a digital nomad, a couple, or a small group exploring Vietnam, this spot delivers comfort, charm, and genuine hospitality in a way thatâ€™s rare to find.
Location, Location, Location
Set right in the heart of Da Nang, the location alone makes this Airbnb worth booking. Youâ€™re within walking distance to so many great restaurants, night markets, cafes, and cultural spots. The area feels lively but not overwhelmingâ€”just the right mix of convenience and comfort. Whether I wanted to grab local street food or take a stroll to the ocean, everything was nearby. Itâ€™s central without the chaos, and thatâ€™s a big win.
The Space
The rooms are beautifully designedâ€”clean, minimal yet

Phuâ€™s place is as described and photographed. Itâ€™s a small one bedroom apartment, centrally located where there are lots of restaurants and bars around the area, while the beach is a few min walk away. Despite its location and that there is a bar right across the street, this unit is quiet at night as it is at the back side of the building and faces another building. The downside is that it does not get a lot of sunlight during the day but I take that over noisy nights. There is a coffee shop on the ground floor that you have to walk through to get to the elevator but it was not an issue for me.
Thanks for the great stay.

Phu is a wonderful host! He shows great hospitality, is very responsive and great to communicate with, his place is quite convenient, almost everything you need can be done within walking distance. The coffee shop downstairs is a great place to work too if you need to work. I enjoyed my time at his place. Thank you Phu for everything!

Absolutely loved staying here! Been in Da Nang several times and this was the best. Highly recommend this!

I stayed at Phu's place for 5 nights.
The place is just like the photos.
It was overall clean especially the bathroom, which I think is very important.
Also Phu was always responsive and friendly through out the stay.
I liked how the place provided room cleaning every 3 days.
However, the place is not sound proof at all.
Event though you can't hear the noise from outside you can still hear even the very little noises coming from the hall way and downstairs .
Plus it's right next to the laundry room so
I couldn't get much sleep.
Considering the price, I think it's a moderate place to stay.

Great space, great kitchen: can make your dinners. Ultimately, great space as it has a dining area, kitchen, bathroom, and large bedroom space.
Host is very responsive: morning, afternoon and night.
Nomads: every 5 hours the router may go dark but no worries just unplug and plug it back in. If I had a long string of meetings up ahead I would simply restart the router proactively and the internet works great all throughout. Itâ€™s a fast wifi. And again, if anything happens â€” you just restart the router, and itâ€™s back on within 30 seconds. Restart it at the beginning of your shift and nothing will happen for at least the next 5-6 hours so itâ€™s honestly nothing to worry about.
This is a great space, highly worth the money. I do recommend.
Phuâ€™s Airbnb was very clean, nice, and spacious. During our stay in da nang it was our favorite rental. Also Phu is a great house who cares about his renters and always replys quickly!

Mr. Phuâ€™s place is remarkable and very near to restaurants, malls and airport. I would recommend it to someone who also works remote, his wifi at Lu Coffee downstairs is also really fast more than 200mbps, wifi inside the room is around 80mbps which is also spectacular. Quiet, has a laundry area, and you can also cook. There are lots of restos nearby. Check in and check out was smooth. Mr. Phu (as we call him) is very down to earth and he is very responsive to your chats whenever you have questions. Your room also gets cleaned every other day. The lady maintaining is friendly too. Iâ€™d definitely recommend this out to people who likes a spacious room plus reliable internet for work!

Great place to stay around the An Thuong area. Owner is super friendly. Nice rooms, clean and good design.
Coffee place downstairs is super chill and relaxed.
Highly recommend
Phu lived up to his super host status.  Everything went perfect and we had a great stay.

Great spot in a fantastic location!
Phu is an excellent hostâ€”super friendly and incredibly responsive. If any issues came up, he addressed them right away, which I really appreciated.
The property is conveniently located above a cool coffee shop, making it easy to grab a drink, get some work done, or just relax.
One suggestion for improvement would be to add more kitchen items, such as extra plates, bowls, glasses, utensils, and maybe a blender.. While the current setup is sufficient, a few additional items could make it even better.
Aside from the noise from construction nearbyâ€”which was beyond anyoneâ€™s controlâ€”my stay was nearly perfect. Highly recommend!
Great stay at Phu's place! Excellent location, you're in the middle of everything. The wifi is reliable and the cafe downstairs is also very cute.
It was good, no problems
Phu was a very helpful host. My sister and I enjoyed our stay. We will book again the next time we are in Da Nang.
Great location, PhÃº was great to deal with.

would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting da nang

Great place to stay with family especially with kids. Pool was awesome. receptionists were very friendly and hospitality was exceptional.Peaceful and calm neighbourhood.
Only issues we faced were with the loose contacts of charging sockets and low bathroom lighting.
But overall it was a fantastic experience at Johnâ€™s boutique villa.

A very comfortable and clean suite. The little kitchenette was very useful and we loved the sauna and swimming pool! The only thing we noticed was a strong cleaning product smell in the room - Iâ€™m sensitive to strong chemical scents and wouldâ€™ve struggled if we stayed more than a night but others might not even notice it.

My partner and I stayed at Johnâ€™s apartment for 1 month and it was perfect for us. We stayed on their 2nd floor and had a nice balcony and kitchen. The sauna and pool was such a nice bonus as well and I think I used it almost everyday. The room was also very clean and we had room service clean our room twice a week. The location was also perfect and had everything within walking distance such as cafes, restaurants, or the beach. Lastly, the staff was above and beyond and the hospitality was simply amazing. We will be back again when revisiting da Nang.

Absolute fantastic place to stay. The room is spotless and large. They clean your room a few times a week. Place is so close to the beach and lots of cozy restaurants and cafÃ©s. Staff is so friendly and nice. Could not ask for a better place to stay. Perfect for long visits. Highly recommend!

I recommend staying at Johnâ€™s Boutique Villa because it was spacious, clean, and close to the beach! The receptionists are so sweet and accommodating if you ever need anything. Beds were comfy and the space is cleaned daily. Be aware that the sliding windows from the bathroom does look into another roomâ€™s balcony if opened, otherwise theyâ€™re covered when closed!

I highly reccomend this Villa! The place went beyond and above my expectations. For an Airbnb they cleaned our room daily, with free water, fresh towels and the staff are very friendly and accomodating. The location is a few mins walk from Da Nang Beach. There are a lot to do within the area and very good restaurants nearby. Plus we love that it's near a very good coffee shop that we go daily in the morning (Wind coffee shop). I plan to go back here next year and will reccomend this place to all my friends and family. They have a cute dog in the lobby! Hello Kiki! would like to commend their staff as well who made our stay hospitable and efficient. Raymond and the lovely lady who welcomed and help us throughout our stay thank you! this is my 2nd visit to danang, and the place is amazing, located very near to the beach, restaurants, and mini market. we just walk to the market to buy foods, which we can cook, it is very recommended for both family or friends as they are very convenient.
for the host, they are amazing, very helpful and fast respons, i ask request and ask anything which always given directly.
another tips, they also offer car and motorcycle rent which is cheaper than others. surely will choose this place again if i back to danang â¤ï¸

It was great staying at john's boutique villa for us and our little kids. It was walking distance from mini marts, the kindest banh mi vendors along moon milk mart and the beach! The staff were all very friendly and laundry service was also available. Their good value car service also helped us get on our day trips to Hoi An and Bana Hills. This all made our Da Nang stay more enjoyable and memorable.

Wonderful experience at John Boutique! The receptionist is welcoming and helpful. The room is clean and tidy. Would definitely stay for longer given its exceptionally reasonable price. Only thing to nitpick is its shower hot water temperature, which fluctuates occasionally between too hot and too cold.

Prior our Vietnam trip, John is very accommodating to our requests and he is very responsive to our queries. The staffs at the reception are also very friendly and approachable which made our stay smooth and relaxing. The location is also good as there are lots of food and restaurants near the unit. All in all, we had a good stay and will definitely go back to Vietnam.

The villa is at an excellent location with a 5 min. walk to the beach. We (group of 3) stayed there for 3 nights. The room was very clean with all the basic amenities needed. The employees at the reception are all very polite and super friendly and always ready to help. Overall it's worth every penny spent and definitely recommended.

Great place to stay when youâ€™re on vacation! The area is quite peaceful and is located close to Da Nang beach so you have easy access to the same.
the reception staff are fantastic very warm and welcoming. always say hello and wish us a good day. it's a lovely place to stay

Our family of 4 stayed for 5 nights in John's Boutique Villa. Location wise it is about a 5 to 10 minute walk to Danang beach area, with mini-markets about 3 minutes away (to buy snacks / water etc.) which is very convenient.
What stood out is the reception (they helped check us in and also with our bags to the room). Reception is very welcoming, friendly and helpful and allowed an earlier check-in which is great as we arrived about 2 hours early (1pm vs. 3pm). The reception also helped guide us to local food areas and even took a family picture (printed with frame) as a parting gift. Thank you!
The only small downside is the room is as per pictures, a little small, but we didn't really stay long in the room so it suited us perfectly.

Linh was a great host who went above and beyond to help us along with our trip. She was kind to provide extra benefits like a taxi from the airport on the first day and charcoal for the barbecue, despite not being obliged to do so. Moreover, the place was cozy and comfortable, and my friends and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here, finding it a good place to rest and recover after a long day of exploring Da Nang. Highly recommended!

Host was super super nice and friendly ğŸ¥° One night there was a water disruption after 10pm. Host felt really bad and even gave us snacks and compensation for it. Very understanding although not her fault.
I wanted ti visit a few places but wouldnâ€™t read the map, she located for me and even send me the google location for me to follow. Really helpful.
The place overall cozy and clean. Definitely recommended!

3 good things about this place:
- Location is amazing. A few minutes' walk from the beach, great street food, seafood, and a local market.
- Price is reasonable
- Free airport pickup, and one free housekeeping session
3 less good things about this place:
- In the upstairs bedroom, you can hear construction on a home next door, as of June 2025
- If stairs are an issue, you need to bring up luggage on tight stairs. (You're better off renting out the downstairs unit in that case.)
- It was a bit tight for 6 people (2 people to a bed). But this is reflected in the cheaper price.

This place was what we were looking for.  Located among local private residential homes but only 5 minutes walk to the beach and to many shops, services, and restaurants (Ba Van is right across the home and the food is yummy and the owner very friendly).  The place was spacious enough for our family of 5!

Had a great stay overall! The location was perfectâ€”just 5 to 8 minutes by Grab to the central area, and about a 10-minute walk to My Khe Beach.
The host was also very responsive and helpful throughout the stay. Everything went smoothlyâ€”would definitely recommend!

We really enjoyed our stay at Linhâ€™s place! Linh was a very responsive and friendly host and answered any questions we had right away. She gave us local recommendations as well. The house was clean and in a safe area and was walking distance to the beach and several restaurants. Highly recommend!

We had an incredible stay here. Spacious, clean, great location and Linh, the host, accommodated to a later checkout time when we needed.
Would definitely recommend staying here if you are in Da Nang!

My friends and I (7 of us) had an amazing stay at Linh's place in Da Nang. The accommodation was perfect for our groupâ€”spacious, clean, and very well-equipped. Linh was an exceptional host, always responsive and full of great recommendations. The location was convenient, making it easy for us to explore the city. We all felt right at home and couldnâ€™t have asked for a better experience. Highly recommend Linhâ€™s place for anyone visiting Da Nang!
It was a great, cozy stay which was right in the heart of the city. Great vibe! Total value for money spent!

We had a comfortable time here before coming to Phu Quoc. Vincent is very warmly welcoming, he has useful instructions. The new house and he said we were the first guest, it was very modern and luxurious beauty, everything was surprisingly clean. Can walk to the nearby beach to swim in the afternoon, Da Nang sea is really clean. Good proposal and great experience when we have just returned to Da Nang, unfortunately we are late and the international fireworks festival ends. Thanks again Vincent

Great place! Everything matched the description â€” clean, cozy, and comfortable. The host was responsive and helpful. I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend it!

I stayed 3 days here. The room is very clean and exactly like in the pictures. The host is very friendly and responsive.
There are great restaurants near the location and 15 mins walk to the beach. Iâ€™m gonna stay here every time I come to Danang. Great place.

Phuoc's home is 5' on foot from the beach and the crowded area. It is just above a mini market which is very nice! There are cafÃ©s, restaurants and juice shops in the area and it is very quiet. There is a washing machine and a terrace for shared use. We enjoyed our stay.

The apartment is just like the picture, very quiet, airy, just a few minutes walk to the beach, there is a motorbike parking space, there is a minimart on the 1st floor which is very convenient, it operates 24/7. The neighbors are happy and friendly. The host is enthusiastic, comfortable, and supports very quickly when needed. There is a delicious seafood restaurant near the apartment and a laundry shop with cheap prices. Will come back next time. Thanks!
Host is very nice and easy to work with.

The neighborhood is incredibly convenient,  with plenty of food options nearby. What's more, the host was exceptionally kind, attentive, and flexible, making sure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to others.

We had a wonderful stay! Hang and Phuong were very easy to communicate with and always available whenever we needed support. Their responsiveness made everything smooth and stress-free. The place looked exactly like the photosâ€”clean, cozy, and well-equipped with everything you might need for a 5-day trip. We especially loved the great beach nearby and the stunning sunrise and sunset views. Highly recommended!

The place is very quiet and peaceful despite being right by the beach and all of the fun things that go on there.  The apartment features stunning city and coastal views since it sits on the corner of a high floor.  The host was very kind and responsive.  There is a small supermarket next door should you require any late night snacks or drinks.  The beach across the street is perfect for swimming.  The water is very clear and you will see fish and other marine life swimming about you.  I enjoyed my stay here and will be back soon.

The room is spacious and offers a lovely view through the surrounding glass windows. It has been newly renovated, so everything feels fresh and clean, though there is a slight unpleasant smell. The staff are very responsive and supportive. Itâ€™s just a 2-minute walk to the beach, and the highlight of the building is the charming terrace just outside the lobby.

What an amazing stay overall! The location was perfect and the staff? Absolutely AWESOME. I typically donâ€™t need much help when I travel since Iâ€™m very self-sufficient, but the team went above and beyondâ€”truly top-notch hospitality.

The studio is a perfect reflection of the photos, brand new and spotlessly clean. It's equipped with all the essentials for a comfortable long-term stay, including weekly cleaning services. excellent place and stay for the price. would recommend, especially to backpackers who wants a break from hostels.

place is exactly what you see in the advertisement, free cleaning everyday if you'd like to, there's a building construction beside the place, it didn't bother me since i sleep well, 10mins walk from the beach, will definitely recommend this place and consider to stay if im in Danang

Super comfy and clean studio apartment! Felt right at home, there was a bit of construction outside but it didnâ€™t bug me at all! Area is generally on the quiet end, and easy to commute around! :)
host young chan is super responsive and helpful!

The apartment is very clean and matches the description and photos. Daily cleaning was offered.
A minor downside is that thereâ€™s construction nearby, which can be noisy in the mornings, but the host informed us about it in advance

Apartments is really good. Every detail was a pleasant experience. Host is a good person and always to respond. Place has a good location but there is one thing that you should to know. Construction are really noisy and it's so close to the apartments. So if you don't like noisy places it's not working. But everything is super good.

We spent a week at Young Chan's apartment. Perfect stay. Good wifi, AC, hot shower, comfortable, and well.designed studio. Appreciated the washmachine and drying rack on balcony. Apt is quiet. Near park with local activites. Walkable to beach and An Thong restaurants. Lotte Mart just over bridge.  Young Chan easy to contact, held our luggage until checkin. Highly recommend for an economical stay!

We had an exceptional stay at this property, perfectly situated just a 15-minute walk from the beautiful My Khe Beach. The convenience factor was outstanding - the neighborhood offers numerous mini markets, charming coffee shops, and various restaurants to explore. We were pleasantly surprised to find a bus station nearby that connects to the iconic Dragon Bridge in only 10 minutes.
The accommodation itself was immaculate, fully equipped with all necessary amenities that made us feel completely at home. Chan was an exemplary host - incredibly helpful and maintaining excellent communication throughout our stay. We wholeheartedly recommend this place to anyone visiting Da Nang!
Very comfortable and clean stay. The host communicated promptly. Unit is exactly like the pictures shown
Place is clean like the photos. Young chan is very responsive
A nice apartment not far from the beachâ€”very clean, cozy, and well-equipped with all the necessary amenities. I really enjoyed my stay.

Young Chan is such a gentleman. I had trouble with something (not related to his home) at midnight and had to wake him up. He was extremely kind and helpful and took care of me. He actually stayed up until almost 2am searching for answers for me. He was always super responsive and helpful with everything.
The room is clean and very quiet. I saw people complain about the construction in the reviews but itâ€™s barely audible.
Wonderful place to stay. I will 100% go back again when I visit Da Nang.
Thank you for everything!!

It was very nice to stay for the first day of trip. There is a convenience store nearby. I highly recommend it!
And there was no construction when I was staying. So it was really quiet.

We had to switch our accommodation in the middle of our trip due to dissatisfaction of a previous accommodation. We booked this place on the day of, and I am so glad we did. We felt much more comfortable - the place was exactly as pictured and described. We are also very grateful for the host to quickly accommodate our request. There is construction in the morning, but we had to wake up early anyways, so it wasn't a big deal. Overall, I highly recommend!

Place is a bit out of the way from the busier streets, but you can easily get around with a Grab. It's clean, good AC, comfy bed, I was offered cleanings for the apartment, nearby a lot of great restaurants within a 10-15 walk. Host is very responsive.
Only minor complaints are there's no detergent for the washer, but Young Chan was able to get me enough for 1-2 loads so don't be afraid to ask. Also, the building next door just started construction and was awakened at 6AM, keep that in mind if you're sensitive to noise. This is out of the owners control, so I don't blame them.

Cong's accommodation was great to stay at. It was a few minutes walk to the beach, the street has tons of food places, lots of convenience stores and laundromats nearby as well, and some nice bars as well. The room was fine as well, clean, with all toiletries, and a very low price range. I'd be totally fine with staying here again.

The room is quite cozy and full of necessary items. I really like the location, it is right at the sea and near local restaurants and many cafes. Below the building there is a spa shop so it is quite convenient. The owner is extremely friendly and supports me a lot in the process here.

An absolutely amazing stay! For such a good price. The staff are super helpful & friendly. The cleaner was so lovely too. The host was responsive. An amazing location. 5 min walk from 1000s of restaurants, bars, salons & the beach. I will definitely be staying here again!
Conveniently located. Clean. Quiet. Super nice staff, very helpful. Absolutely worth the price. Would stay here again!

The hotel was very close the the My An beach. I loved that everything I needed was in walking distance from the hotel.
Room is basic and cost but very comfortable and perfectly suited for 1 person.
I actually stayed here twice for short term.

Cong and team were incredibly helpful.
Room is clean, 4/5 quiet (noise in the hallway from guests with open doors, normal street noise that was pretty quiet), the mattress is medium/hard, but as soft as most mattresses here, and the washroom is a good size.
There is a concierge until 10pm and then a locked door with card entry.
there is a very good pho restaurant nearby.
one thing to ask about - I could not get the hot water to work for more than 2 minutes. many places in Vietnam have trouble with hot water working at all, so this is better than that, but still not ideal.

One of the nicest places I have stayed. The location is great. It was next to the beach with tons of restaurants and things to do. The two hostess ( Linda and Maria,  I gave them a Spanish name because I could not pronounce their Vietnamese name were exceptional and sweet). I will be back!!!!

Excellent choice if you're solo traveling on a budget. I'd say this is one step above a hostel where at least you have your own space. Nothing wrong with that as it's priced accordingly. Owner is very responsive and helpful even with late check-in.

nice place! itâ€™s also nearby the beach. host was also responsive even early in the morning. very reasonable price if youâ€™re in Da Nang!

I stayed in Horizon for only 1 night and loved it. I was very lucky that they could help me out at short notice. The room I had was clean, comfortable, and full of equipments which was very good value. The location couldnâ€™t really be more perfect - 5 minutes walk from the stunning My Khe beach and within walking distance of so many amazing cafes, restuarants etc. I love Da Nang, and this was a great place to be based. Ha - the owner is very polite, professional and friendly, and his staff are brilliant. The people at the massage place below are also super friendly.
great value for price, right by beach, higher quality than other stays i tried
clean room, helpful reception and very kind cleaner, close to restaurant and beach
Molto vicino al quartiere di My An e alla spiaggia. Stanza e zone comuni pulite e confortevoli. Host sempre disponibile e pronto a dare aiuto. Grazie mille!
Chá»§ nhÃ  tá»‘t bá»¥ng!

Cong is very friendly and proactive, and the hotel property is in a perfect location for those who wish to be near the beach and various restaurants in the tourist area. The room was also surprisingly peaceful despite the busy neighborhood, except for one night when other guests were partying in a nearby room. The photos are very inaccurate and should be fixed, however the room was bigger than in the photos and despite being slightly worn, was actually quite comfortable.
Wonderful stay at the Horizon â€“ nothing too fancy and exactly as advertised. Very very nice staff that took care of my laundry, brought me fruit and kept my room clean. Thank you!

Cheap but completely furnished, with a mini fridge and a new air conditioner, this little hotel is close to the beach and offers comfortable rooms with a rooftop overlooking the sea. I enjoy everything about this place.

The room was big enough, the bed was very comfortable, shower pressure was great! Fridge in the room, bottles of water refreshed each day as well as towels. The woman at reception was so lovely, she went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable- she even changed my TV because the one in the room wasnâ€™t working, which I really appreciated! She is a joy to speak to! You could barely hear any noise from outside despite it being in a very central busy area! 5 minutes walk to the beach too. The only â€˜conâ€™ is you can hear when people are in the corridor, and sometimes the other guests and the cleaners were quite loud, especially in the early morning. Maybe a reminder to everyone to be mindful of how echoey it is would help. Otherwise, I really enjoyed my stay and I would stay again. Extremely good value! Thank you â˜ºï¸
Great place, would highly recommend! :)

As a female solo traveler, I felt very safe here.  The building is new so no issues with mold or cockroaches as Iâ€™ve heard from other travelers whoâ€™ve had those issues in other apartments. About 5 min walking distance from the beach. Grocery stores and pharmacies near by. Thereâ€™s a washer and drying rack in the roof but thereâ€™s also laundry services near by as well. AC works great. Overall very clean and maintained apartment. The host and his staff were very accommodating during my long stay here ğŸ˜„. Would definitely stay here again if I come back to Da Nang.

I really enjoyed staying at Phuoc's place. The room is very nice and spacious, and it had everything I needed; a wonderful kitchen with lots of utensils and a huge fridge, a very large and comfortable bed, table and chairs, balcony, and very reliable WiFi. The host was very responsive, proactive, professional, helpful and kind. On the ground floor there is a shop and that was very convenient. It had everything I needed like water, milk, fruit, chocolates, and a lot more. There is also a washing machine. The location is superb. Very close to the beach, with many restaurants,  shops, and pharmacies nearby. I had a wonderful stay and I definitely recommend. The beach is absolutely gorgeous.

Looks like Iâ€™m exaggerating but this is one of the best guys and places Iâ€™ve stayed at. They are so helpful, friendly, kind and so responsive. Would recommend anyone to stay here whoâ€™s coming to Da nang.
nice studio apartment, few minutes walk to the beach, and really helpful hosts who checked in multiple times to make sure everything was good
Exactly what I expected..host is super friendly and available anytime ğŸ‘ğŸ»
Excellent budget option for living near the beach My Khe Beach.
Good host and clean apartment. About 3 - 4 blocks from the beach.
Thank you so much.

A quiet, spotless clean, comfortable place to recharge after a busy day, with new and quality furniture and appliances.
Location is very close to the beach, local market, supermarkets, and the green area. There is a tree in the garden/balcony area, which I really respect that they kept it instead of cutting.
The best thing about the place is the host and her team. They are super supportive, always responsive, and taking care of the place and the guest well.
As a huge plus, they are open to suggestions to make the experience better for the guest. A great stay.

I had a great stay here! The place is very clean, spacious, and well-kept. The room is on the first floor and comes with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and hot/cold shower. They provide basic toiletries like a toothbrush, toothpaste, comb, and fresh towels, which is really convenient. The kitchen is spotless and fully stocked with cooking tools if you want to prepare meals. Itâ€™s just a short walk to the beach and about a 10â€“15 minute drive to Da Nang City Center. The host offers motorcycle rentals, making it easy to get around. They were very accommodating, quick to respond, and shared great recommendations for food, activities, and local spots. The neighborhood is quiet, peaceful, and feels very safe. Overall, this is a great place to stay if you want comfort, convenience, and helpful local insight. Highly recommended!
